ModMetaData.name: Topographic Rimworld Map
ModMetaData.author: SneezingSeal
ModMetaData.description:
===== DEV TOOL ===== (don't try to play with this)
This mod changes biome generation and places color specific biomes by terrain elevation. This is useful if : -You want to see how high is Rimworld terrain if you plan to create a biome depending on elevation. -You want to make you eyes bleed.
Generated biomes are unplayable. (Load after Biomeskit)
